Package ss.pentago.network.protocol

Class MessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.pentago.network.protocol.MessageFactory
  • public class MessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    MessageFactory deals only with the proper formatting of messages. The ProtocolHandler classes, on the other hand, should be used for the logic around sending/receiving these messages.

      • createHelloMessage

        public static java.lang.String createHelloMessage​(java.lang.String description,
                                                  boolean isAuthSupported,
                                                  boolean isCryptSupported,
                                                  boolean isChatSupported,
                                                  boolean isRankSupported)
        Format a hello message.
        Parameters:
        description - the description of either Server or Client
        isAuthSupported - whether the auth extension is supported
        isCryptSupported - whether the crypt extension is supported
        isChatSupported - whether the chat extension is supported
        isRankSupported - whether the rank extension is supported
        Returns:
        formatted message

        rotation - the rotation index
